Legal_Issue: Validity of the '393 patent against generic version of amlodipine besylate

Decision_Outcome: Application allowed; Pharmascience's invalidity challenge rejected
Credibility_Factor: Expert testimonies evaluated by the court
Legal_Rule: Patent must meet requirements for sufficiency, utility, and non-obviousness
Standard_of_Review: Standard applicable in judicial review under NOC Regulations
Procedural_Issue: Preclusion from relitigating obviousness due to prior litigation

Outcome_on_Merits: Pfizer succeeded on merits; patent upheld as valid and enforceable
Review_Standard: Reasonableness or correctness, depending on issue
